about_the_game:
This 3D asset pack includes a rich collection of buildings such as stores, amusement facilities, restaurants, and skyscrapers, as well as digital signage, roads, streetlights, utility poles, and other facilities that make up a city. Skyscrapers are ideal for creating beautiful skylines in the distance, and can be used to create vibrant, Asian-style urban landscapes. With these assets, you can freely design your ideal cityscape with attention to detail!

City Assets
DLC Contents
- 3D Stamps: 46
- Sample Map: 1
detailed_description:
This 3D asset pack includes a rich collection of buildings such as stores, amusement facilities, restaurants, and skyscrapers, as well as digital signage, roads, streetlights, utility poles, and other facilities that make up a city. Skyscrapers are ideal for creating beautiful skylines in the distance, and can be used to create vibrant, Asian-style urban landscapes. With these assets, you can freely design your ideal cityscape with attention to detail!

City Assets

name: RPG Developer Bakin City Assets

short_description: This 3D asset pack includes buildings like stores, restaurants, and skyscrapers, plus digital signage, roads, and streetlights. Skyscrapers enhance distant skylines, perfect for vibrant Asian-style cities. Create your ideal cityscape with detailed assets!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
